column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Our server was Bree. I was pretty unhappy with her level of service. My husband has a pretty severe lactose intolerance and one of our friends has a life threatening allergy to uncooked vegetables
column4: my husband wanted to try the bosscat burger chef's style
column5: but she gave push back when he asked no cheese due to a food allergy stating she'll have to ask the chef if it's ok. What? Then my friend wants to order the pulled pork sandwich
column6: no coleslaw (so she doesn't die at the table)
column7: and same story -- I'll have to ask the chef if he'll accommodate. This put me off so bad and ruined the vibe heavily for me. They did end up accommodating it thankfully
column8: but the process really bothered me
